botMessages.message: Are you looking to view, print or pay an invoice?
Great, I can help with that!
Which one of these tasks are you looking to do?

retryMessages.message: Please choose one of the two buttons above.

botMessages.message: What is the part number you would like to check?
RICH_TEXT:Please click here to view the most current stock availability on the right side of the page. Click on 'More Detail' for more information.
Were you able to find the information regarding stock availability that you were looking for?
What is your PO?
RICH_TEXT:Please click here to view the orders associated with this PO: View Orders Associated with PO
Were you able to get the information that you were looking for?
Are you checking on stock availability?
Have you already placed an order?
Do you have the order number or PO?
This info is provided on the order. Let's pull up the order.

RICH_TEXT: Click here to go to "My Orders" Use the search field in 'My Orders' to search using the part number. If you don't have specific information, it's not a problem, you can view all of your orders here.
The back ordered status is shown next to the items for any products that are currently on backorder.
Were you able to find the answer to your question regarding stock availability?
It looks like you are looking to do a return. Is this correct?
Which one of the following selections best fit your issue?
Please type your question in the input box below. I'm happy to help.

botDialogs.label: Ask the virtual assistant a question

botMessages.message: What is your order number?

retryMessages.message: Order numbers are made up of numbers 0-9.

botMessages.message: RICH_TEXT:Please click here to view the order: View Order *If you placed your order as a guest then click here: View Guest Orders*
Were you able to get the information that you were looking for?
What is your web reference #?
RICH_TEXT:Please click here to view the order: View Order *If you placed your order as a guest then click here: View Guest Orders*
Were you able to get the information that you were looking for?
It looks like your concern is regarding an order, is that correct?
Ok, great! Please select from one of the options below.

botQuickReplyOptions.literalValue: Return an Item on an Order

botStepConditions.rightOperandValue: Return an Item on an Order
Return an Item on an Order

botMessages.message: Hi, I'm Smiley Bot, a virtual assistant.
Let's transfer you over to a live rep so that you can be better assisted. Our live agents are available Monday thru Friday from 9am ET to 5pm ET.
Would you like to end the chat or return to the main menu?
I'm glad that I was able to help! Click the "Close Chat" button to end this chat.
Sorry, I didn't understand that.
RICH_TEXT: Please click here to Review RAs
Do you need further assistance with reviewing this RA?
RICH_TEXT: Please click here to view frequently asked questions regarding FAQs Return FAQs
Do you need further assistance with this matter?
Unfortunately, there are no agents available at the moment.
Please click the button below if you would like to return to the main menu.
Unfortunately, a system error occurred. I'll connect you to an agent who can help.
It seems like you are locked out of your account. Is this the correct assessment of the issue?
RICH_TEXT: Please click here to reset your password
Press 'Continue' once you have clicked on the link to above get to the "Password Reset" page
Please let me know if you have been able to successfully reset your password and login once you received the email with the link to reset your password. The email may take a few minutes to arrive.
Glad to hear that!
Please check your spam and junk folders. If the email was sent to your spam folder then you have to move the email to your primary inbox before you click on the link.
Please let me know if you have been able to successfully reset your password and login after checking your spam and junk folder.
Glad to hear that!

botDialogs.description: This dialog helps a user unlock his account.
botDialogs.label: Locked Account

botMessages.message: Are you seeking information on Automation Direct's conflict mineral policy?
RICH_TEXT:Click here to view the AutomationDirect Conflict Mineral Due Diligence Plan
Were you able to view the AutomationDirect Conflict Mineral Due Diligence Plan?
It looks like you are looking to administer your company's account. Is this correct?
Ok, I can help you with that.
RICH_TEXT: Please click here to go to the page where you can manage your company's user account.
Do you need any additional assistance in managing your user accounts?
Let's find that order. Which of the following can we use to find information on the order in question?

botQuickReplyOptions.literalValue: I Don't Have an Order Number or PO

botMessages.message: RICH_TEXT:Ok, first we'll need to find the order. Please click here to go to 'My Orders' page

Once you are on the page, find the order that you want to cancel. *Tip: Check the "Show Open Orders Only" checkbox underneath the "Search All Purchases" input box since you can only cancel orders that are open.
Did you find the order?

Click on the "Order Actions" button on the right top corner of the order that you want to cancel and then click on 'Request Cancelation'. If you are informed that the order can't be canceled then you will need to return the order once it is received.
Let's get you over to a live agent for further assistance.
Were you able to cancel your order or determine that your order is beyond the point of cancellation?
Which one of the following do you have?
RICH_TEXT: Let's go to the 'My Order's page. Click here to go to the 'My Orders' page

Once you are on the 'My Orders' page then you need to find the order that contains the invoice that you want to view/print. Click on the link for the invoice that is at the bottom of the order and the invoice will be displayed.
Were you able to view the invoice?

retryMessages.message: Please respond with Yes or No.

botMessages.message: What is your order number?

retryMessages.message: Order numbers are made up of numbers 0-9.

botMessages.message: RICH_TEXT:Please click here to access the order: Access Order *If you placed your order as a guest then click here: View Guest Orders*
Were you able to access the order?
Click on the "Order Actions" button and then click on the 'Request Cancellation' option. You may need to minimize the chat to see the "Order Actions" button.

If your order is beyond the point of cancellation you will need to return it once it has been received.
Were you able to cancel your order or determine that your order is beyond the point of cancellation?
Do you have the original order number?
Ok, first we need to find your order.

botMessages.message: Ok, first we need to find your order.
RICH_TEXT: Click here to go to "My Orders" Once you have found your order click on the order number and you will be taken to the 'Order Detail' page for that order.
Were you able to find the information that you were looking for regarding the order?
Are you trying to generate a quote or check availability?
RICH_TEXT:Great, I can help with that. Let's start by going to the shopping cart. Please click here to go to the shopping cart: Shopping Cart.

Add your part numbers and quantities to the Shopping Cart. Then, complete your order or click the 'Get a Quote' button. The pricing provided on our web store is our best price. It is the same low price we offer all customers.
Were you able to get the quote or check the availability?

It is easy to complete your order from your Shopping Cart or from the link on your quote. You can even use your companys Net 30 account on our web store!
If your company requires you to email your purchase order, send it to orders@atuomationdirect.com.
Are you looking for information on discounts?
The pricing provided on our web store is our best price, the same low price we offer all customers.
Would you like a quote?
RICH_TEXT:Great, I can help with that. Let's start by going to the shopping cart. Please click here to go to the shopping cart: Shopping Cart

Add your part numbers and quantities to the Shopping Cart. Then, complete your order or click the 'Get a Quote' button. The pricing provided on our web store is our best price. It is the same low price we offer all customers.
Were you able to get the quote that you needed?
Do I understand correctly that you want to set up an account with a credit application?
RICH_TEXT: Please click here to go to our credit application page.
Have I provided the information you needed to create a credit account?
Are you looking for warranty information?
What is the part number that you are looking for warranty information on?
RICH_TEXT:Please click here to view the warranty policy. The warranty policy is located on the right side of the page. You can click on the icon for further details.
Were you able to find the warranty information for the product that you were interested in?
What is your order number?

retryMessages.message: The order number only consists of numbers.

botMessages.message: RICH_TEXT:Please click here to view the order: View Order *If you placed your order as a guest then click here: View Guest Orders*
Once you are on the 'Order' page then click on the link for the invoice (at the bottom of the order on the light green row) and the invoice will be displayed.
Were you able to view the invoice?
What is your PO?
RICH_TEXT:Please click here to view the orders associated with this PO: View Orders Associated with PO
Once you are on the 'Order' page then click on the link for the invoice (at the bottom of the order on the light green row) and the invoice will be displayed.
Were you able to view the invoice?

RICH_TEXT:Please click here to access all of our compliance related information.
